message.content:
cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.SI, cs.IT, cs.DC 

The paper discusses the application of SDN principles in inter-domain routing, which falls under the category of network architecture and protocols. Therefore, cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the improvement of BGP convergence time, which is related to network security and cryptography (cs.CR) and information theory (cs.IT). The paper proposes a Markovian model for inter-domain networks, which involves mathematical analysis and modeling (cs.SI). Finally, the paper discusses the topology and configuration of inter-domain networks, which falls under the category of distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC).
